Class ND4JDenseTensorProvider

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.tensors.backends.ND4JDenseTensorProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
TensorProvider, ComputeBackend
public class ND4JDenseTensorProvider extends Object implements TensorProvider
ND4J-backed TensorProvider implementation.

This provider uses ND4J (N-Dimensional Arrays for Java) for GPU-accelerated tensor operations. When ND4J is not available on the classpath, it falls back to the native implementation.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
